mapper.select:
select v1.PROJECT_NAME project_num, ( select sum(HDCL.TOTAL_PRICE) FROM HCUX_DOC_CUSTOMS_HEADER HDCH JOIN ( SELECT CUSTOMS_ID, SUM( TOTAL_PRICE ) TOTAL_PRICE FROM HCUX_DOC_CUSTOMS_LINE GROUP BY CUSTOMS_ID ) HDCL ON HDCH.CUSTOMS_ID = HDCL.CUSTOMS_ID WHERE HDCH.INVOICE_NUMBER=v1.PROJECT_NAME )customs_amount,--报关金额 sum(v1.cr_amount) specified_amount,--收汇金额 sum(v1.cr_base_amount) equivalent_amount,--等值金额 ( select sum(v2.base_amount) from HCUX_EPS_PAYMENT_DETAIL v2 where v2.expenditure_type='货款' and v2.PROJECT_NUM=v1.PROJECT_NAME ) has_payment,--已付货款 ( select sum(v5.local_amount) from HCUX_EPS_BILL v5 where v5.accounts='应付账款' and v5.PROJECT_NAME=v1.PROJECT_NAME ) un_payment,--未付贷款 ( select sum(v3.base_amount) from HCUX_EPS_PAYMENT_DETAIL v3 where v3.expenditure_type='出口国内运费' and v3.PROJECT_NUM=v1.PROJECT_NAME )prepaid_freight,--已付运费 ( select sum(v4.functional_currency_amount) from cux_0_Export_cost_v@Ebs_Db v4 where v4.PROJECT_NUMBER=v1.PROJECT_NAME )other_export_expenses--其他出口费用 from HCUX_EPS_RECEIPT_DETAIL v1
AND lower(v1.PROJECT_NAME) like '%'|| lower(#{projectNum}) ||'%'
group by v1.PROJECT_NAME
select STATEMENTS_ID, PROJECT_NUM, EXPORT_ADJUSTMENT from HCUX_EPS_STATEMENTS where PROJECT_NUM = #{projectNum}

SELECT project_num FROM ((select project_num from CUX_HAP_PROJECTS_V@ebs_db CHPV where creation_date >= to_date('2019-06-01','yyyy-MM-dd') ) UNION ( select project_num from CUX_HAP_PROJECTS_V@ebs_db CHPV where project_num in(select project_num from hcux_eps_code) )) PRO

SELECT project_num FROM (select project_num from CUX_HAP_PROJECTS_V@ebs_db CHPV where creation_date < to_date('2019-06-01','yyyy-MM-dd') and project_num not in ( select project_num from HCUX_EPS_CODE ) and project_num in( (select project_Name from cux_Det_acct_of_rec_in_adv_v@ebs_db where LAST_UPDATE_DATE>=to_date('2019-06-01','yyyy-MM-dd') ) union ( select project_num from cux_req_for_pending_payment_v4@ebs_db where LAST_UPDATE_DATE>=to_date('2019-06-01','yyyy-MM-dd') ) ) ) PRO

select STATEMENTS_ID, PROJECT_NUM, EXPORT_ADJUSTMENT, CUSTOMS_AMOUNT, SPECIFIED_AMOUNT, AVERAGE_RATES, EQUIVALENT_AMOUNT, HAS_PAYMENT, UN_PAYMENT, PREPAID_FREIGHT, OTHER_EXPORT_EXPENSES, TAX_REFUNDS, AGENCY_FEE, BALANCE, BALANCE1, RECEIPT_CNY, DOMESTIC_FREIGHT, INCOME_EXPENSES, FINANCIAL_COST, REIMBURSEMENT, AGENCY_FEE1, REMARK,
from HCUX_EPS_STATEMENTS HES where 1=1
and lower(HES.PROJECT_NUM) like '%'|| lower(#{projectNum}) ||'%'
and lower(HES.PROJECT_NUM) >= lower(#{projectNumFrom})
and lower(HES.PROJECT_NUM) <= lower(#{projectNumTo})
and lower(substr(HES.project_num,2,8)) like '%'||lower(#{serialNumber})||'%'
and project_num not in ( select project_num from HCUX_EPS_STATEMENTS where (EXPORT_ADJUSTMENT=0 or EXPORT_ADJUSTMENT is null) and (CUSTOMS_AMOUNT=0 or CUSTOMS_AMOUNT is null) and (SPECIFIED_AMOUNT=0 or SPECIFIED_AMOUNT is null) and (AVERAGE_RATES=0 or AVERAGE_RATES is null) and (EQUIVALENT_AMOUNT=0 or EQUIVALENT_AMOUNT is null) and (HAS_PAYMENT=0 or HAS_PAYMENT is null) and (UN_PAYMENT=0 or UN_PAYMENT is null) and (PREPAID_FREIGHT=0 or PREPAID_FREIGHT is null) and (OTHER_EXPORT_EXPENSES=0 or OTHER_EXPORT_EXPENSES is null) and (TAX_REFUNDS=0 or TAX_REFUNDS is null) and (AGENCY_FEE=0 or AGENCY_FEE is null) and (BALANCE=0 or BALANCE is null) and (BALANCE1=0 or BALANCE1 is null) and (RECEIPT_CNY=0 or RECEIPT_CNY is null) and (DOMESTIC_FREIGHT=0 or DOMESTIC_FREIGHT is null) and (INCOME_EXPENSES=0 or INCOME_EXPENSES is null) and (FINANCIAL_COST=0 or FINANCIAL_COST is null) and (REIMBURSEMENT=0 or REIMBURSEMENT is null) and (AGENCY_FEE1=0 or AGENCY_FEE1 is null) and (REMARK is null) ) order by PROJECT_NUM asc

select round(sum(HES.BALANCE),2)total_Balance from HCUX_EPS_STATEMENTS HES where 1=1
and lower(HES.PROJECT_NUM) like '%'|| lower(#{projectNum}) ||'%'
and lower(HES.PROJECT_NUM) >= lower(#{projectNumFrom})
and lower(HES.PROJECT_NUM) <= lower(#{projectNumTo})
and lower(substr(HES.project_num,2,8)) like '%'||lower(#{serialNumber})||'%'

select STATEMENTS_ID, PROJECT_NUM, EXPORT_ADJUSTMENT, CUSTOMS_AMOUNT, SPECIFIED_AMOUNT, AVERAGE_RATES, EQUIVALENT_AMOUNT, HAS_PAYMENT, UN_PAYMENT, PREPAID_FREIGHT, OTHER_EXPORT_EXPENSES, TAX_REFUNDS, AGENCY_FEE, BALANCE, BALANCE1, RECEIPT_CNY, DOMESTIC_FREIGHT, INCOME_EXPENSES, FINANCIAL_COST, REIMBURSEMENT, AGENCY_FEE1, REMARK,
from HCUX_EPS_STATEMENTS HES where
lower(substr(HES.PROJECT_NUM,2,8)) LIKE lower(#{item}) ||'%'
and lower(HES.PROJECT_NUM) like '%'|| lower(#{projectNum}) ||'%'
and lower(HES.PROJECT_NUM) >= lower(#{projectNumFrom})
and lower(HES.PROJECT_NUM) <= lower(#{projectNumTo})
and lower(substr(HES.PROJECT_NUM,2,8)) like '%'||lower(#{serialNumber})||'%'
and project_num not in ( select project_num from HCUX_EPS_STATEMENTS where (EXPORT_ADJUSTMENT=0 or EXPORT_ADJUSTMENT is null) and (CUSTOMS_AMOUNT=0 or CUSTOMS_AMOUNT is null) and (SPECIFIED_AMOUNT=0 or SPECIFIED_AMOUNT is null) and (AVERAGE_RATES=0 or AVERAGE_RATES is null) and (EQUIVALENT_AMOUNT=0 or EQUIVALENT_AMOUNT is null) and (HAS_PAYMENT=0 or HAS_PAYMENT is null) and (UN_PAYMENT=0 or UN_PAYMENT is null) and (PREPAID_FREIGHT=0 or PREPAID_FREIGHT is null) and (OTHER_EXPORT_EXPENSES=0 or OTHER_EXPORT_EXPENSES is null) and (TAX_REFUNDS=0 or TAX_REFUNDS is null) and (AGENCY_FEE=0 or AGENCY_FEE is null) and (BALANCE=0 or BALANCE is null) and (BALANCE1=0 or BALANCE1 is null) and (RECEIPT_CNY=0 or RECEIPT_CNY is null) and (DOMESTIC_FREIGHT=0 or DOMESTIC_FREIGHT is null) and (INCOME_EXPENSES=0 or INCOME_EXPENSES is null) and (FINANCIAL_COST=0 or FINANCIAL_COST is null) and (REIMBURSEMENT=0 or REIMBURSEMENT is null) and (AGENCY_FEE1=0 or AGENCY_FEE1 is null) and (REMARK is null) ) order by PROJECT_NUM asc

select round(sum(HES.BALANCE),2)total_Balance from HCUX_EPS_STATEMENTS HES where
lower(substr(HES.PROJECT_NUM,2,8)) LIKE lower(#{item}) ||'%'
and lower(HES.PROJECT_NUM) like '%'|| lower(#{projectNum}) ||'%'
and lower(HES.PROJECT_NUM) >= lower(#{projectNumFrom})
and lower(HES.PROJECT_NUM) <= lower(#{projectNumTo})
and lower(substr(HES.PROJECT_NUM,2,8)) like '%'||lower(#{serialNumber})||'%'

SELECT SPECIFIED_AMOUNT, RECEIPT_CNY, EQUIVALENT_AMOUNT, HAS_PAYMENT, DOMESTIC_FREIGHT from ( select round(sum(CR_AMOUNT),2)SPECIFIED_AMOUNT from cux_Det_acct_of_rec_in_adv_v@ebs_db HERD where HERD.METHOD_NAME in('XJ_国外_电汇','XJ_国外_电汇'||'&'||'预付款退款', 'XJ_国内_电汇','XJ_国内_电汇'||'&'||'预付款退款','XJ_虚拟收款','XJ_虚拟收款'||'&'||'预付款退款') AND HERD.currency_code !='CNY' AND HERD.PROJECT_NAME=#{projectNum} and HERD.gl_date>=('2019-06-01') ),--收汇金额 ( select round(sum(CR_AMOUNT),2)RECEIPT_CNY from cux_Det_acct_of_rec_in_adv_v@ebs_db HERD where HERD.METHOD_NAME in('XJ_国外_电汇','XJ_国外_电汇'||'&'||'预付款退款', 'XJ_国内_电汇','XJ_国内_电汇'||'&'||'预付款退款','XJ_虚拟收款','XJ_虚拟收款'||'&'||'预付款退款') and HERD.currency_Code='CNY' AND HERD.PROJECT_NAME=#{projectNum} and HERD.gl_date>=('2019-06-01') ),--人民币收款 ( select round(sum(CR_BASE_AMOUNT),2)EQUIVALENT_AMOUNT from cux_Det_acct_of_rec_in_adv_v@ebs_db HERD where HERD.METHOD_NAME in('XJ_国外_电汇','XJ_国外_电汇'||'&'||'预付款退款', 'XJ_国内_电汇','XJ_国内_电汇'||'&'||'预付款退款','XJ_虚拟收款','XJ_虚拟收款'||'&'||'预付款退款') AND HERD.currency_code !='CNY' AND HERD.PROJECT_NAME=#{projectNum} and HERD.gl_date>=('2019-06-01') ),--等值金额 ( select round(sum(BASE_AMOUNT),2)HAS_PAYMENT from cux_req_for_pending_payment_v4@ebs_db HEPD where HEPD.EXPENDITURE_TYPE='货款' AND HEPD.PROJECT_NUM=#{projectNum} AND HEPD.STATUS='已付' and HEPD.payment_date>=to_date('2019-06-01','yyyy-MM-dd') ),--已付货款 ( select round(sum(BASE_AMOUNT),2)DOMESTIC_FREIGHT from cux_req_for_pending_payment_v4@ebs_db HEPD where HEPD.EXPENDITURE_TYPE='出口-国内运费' AND HEPD.PROJECT_NUM=#{projectNum} AND HEPD.STATUS='已付' and HEPD.payment_date>=to_date('2019-06-01','yyyy-MM-dd') )--国内运费
